item.title: Wall Street loves this recent IPO with one analyst calling it the ‘social network trading platform’
item.description: Wall Street analysts are extremely bullish on eToro, with estimates for potential upside ranging between 11% and 24%.

item.title: These two high-profile chip stocks look overextended, says Katie Stockton
item.description: The chart analyst breaks down the charts on Broadcom and Nvidia.

item.title: Topgolf Callaway stock jumps 11% after director scoops up more than $2 million worth of shares
item.description: Adebayo Ogunlesi, a director with ties to BlackRock and OpenAI, made his first purchase of the golf stock in nearly three years.

item.title: Best Stocks: Three healthcare names to ponder including a biotech back to levels not seen in a decade
item.description: Josh and Sean note healthcare stocks are popping up in a big way on the Best Stocks list.

item.title: Buy this steel processing chemical stock for more than 33% upside, says Jefferies
